US 49 States Excludes Alaska, Hawaii and Puerto Rico. Includes DC.

Source: R/data.R
mapUS49.Rd

US 49 States Excludes Alaska, Hawaii and Puerto Rico. Includes DC.

mapUS49

Format

A SpatialPolygonsDataFrame

Source

Made with Natural Earth. http://www5.statcan.gc.ca/cansim/

Examples

if (FALSE) {
 library(sp); library(metis)
 sp::plot(mapUS49)
 head(mapUS49@data)
}
